summary: Scientific American is a popular science magazine, published  since August 28, 1845, making it the oldest continuously published magazine in the United States.
full_text:
Scientific American  is an American popular science magazine. It has a long history of presenting scientific information on a monthly basis to the general educated public, with careful attention to the clarity of its text and the quality of its specially commissioned color graphics. Many famous scientists, including Albert Einstein, have contributed articles in the past 170 years. It is the oldest continuously published monthly magazine in the United States.
